description:
SC2 Ranks lets you search for Starcraft 2 players from around the world using sc2ranks.com. View your friends profiles or perhaps a professional player!


Features: 

+ Search for Starcraft 2 profiles in all regions including eu, us, kr, tw, sea, ru & la
+ View team information such as rank and win/loss ratio
+ View team members and their profiles
+ Save your favourite characters to view at a later time

Disclaimer
